Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Closemouthed \Close"mouthed`\, a. Cautious in speaking; secret; wary; uncommunicative. [1913 Webster]

closemouthed adj : inclined to secrecy or reticence about divulging information; "although they knew her whereabouts her friends kept close about it" [syn: {close}, {closelipped}, {secretive}, {tightlipped}]
